artist: Artist: Edited and contributions by Joe McDonnell; Artist: Mark Akgulian; Artist: Holly Anderson; Artist: Andy Baird; Artist: Michael Brehm; Artist: Robert Corbit; Artist: Carol Gaard; Artist: Frank Gaard; Artist: William McKearn; Artist: Greg Miller; Artist: Ann Morgan; Artist: Ed Rath; Artist: John Rath; Artist: Jon West; Artist: Fritz Wolfmeyer; Artist: Chris Woodward; Publisher: Artpolice, Minneapolis
description: 20 pages, saddle-stapled: b/w heavy stock covers; black-and-white cover with four separate images; "Artpolice/Express/Vol. 1, No. 1, Dec. 31, 1980" across top; images are of suns or globes exploding, planes and helicopters, and a large globe-type lantern
title: Artpolice Express, Vol. 1, No. 1
